content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'categoria' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'silver')
CREATE TABLE silver.categoria
	(
	 [ID_CATEGORIA] int,
	 [NOME_CATEGORIA] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_categoria
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO silver.categoria
(ID_CATEGORIA 1, NOME_CATEGORIA 2)
FROM 'https://adlstrnsolar.dfs.core.windows.net/treinamento/silver/CATEGORIA'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM silver.categoria
GO
